item.title: Consumer group Which? Is taking tech giant Qualcomm to a tribunal claiming the firm forced Apple and Samsung to pay inflated prices and licensing fees for essential handset components, which pushed up the cost of those smartphones for consumers. #Qualcomm

item.title: Nimrod Cohen is among the 20 Israeli hostages who are set for release on Monday. They have been held in Gaza since the 7 October attacks in 2023. In exchange for the hostages, Israel will release 250 Palestinian prisoners and more than 1,700 detainees. #T
